column5: The very spacious Marais Suite is ideal for a couple on a romantic getaway or for a party of three as the adjacent former Victorian-era sleeping porch has been converted to a sitting room with loveseat sofa bed. An enormous bath, formerly another bedroom, features tub/shower and antique vanities. Golden oak antiques dominate the suite which occupies the entire back wing of the house. The warm oak fireplace keeps it cozy.
column8: The Marais Suite at Pecan Street Inn
